mapper.insert: insert into account (login_name, user_name, identity_number, pay_user_id, pay_account_id, balance, freeze, register_time) value(#{loginName}, #{userName}, #{identityNumber}, #{payUserId}, #{payAccountId}, #{balance}, #{freeze}, #{registerTime})
mapper.select: select t.login_name from account t JOIN user_role r ON t.`login_name` = r.`login_name` AND r.`role` = 'LOANER' where t.login_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{loginName}), '%')
select login_name from account where login_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{loginName}), '%')
select * from account where login_name = #{loginName} for update
mapper.update: update account set balance = #{balance}, freeze = #{freeze}, auto_invest = #{autoInvest}, no_password_invest = #{noPasswordInvest}, point = #{point} where login_name = #{loginName}
mapper.select: select login_name from account where (if(length(identity_number) = 18,substring(identity_number,11,2),substring(identity_number,9,2))) = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%m')
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(point),0) FROM point_bill WHERE point > 0 AND login_name = #{loginName}
SELECT IFNULL(point, 0) FROM account WHERE login_name = #{loginName}
select login_name from account where (if(length(identity_number) = 18,substring(identity_number,11,4),substring(identity_number,9,4))) = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%m%d')
